data.text: @HSCBoard @AlanStout19 The mask in the photo is obviously useless for filtering aerosols or respiratory pathogens. You have no right to be asking anybody to wear ineffective PPE.  NHS workers deserve N95 masks. @WrecklessGamer

@HSCBoard @AlanStout19 Only takes a few people who don’t care/anti-mask in enclosed health care setting where there are vulnerable people to cause harm. 
+ more abuse for staff who may try to persuade those who won’t wear a mask to wear one. All they have to say is it’s my choice & it is now.
